modName: Encumbered and Level Up Reminder Messages Removed
summary: Removes those annoying messages that keep recurring when you are encumbered or haven't yet gone to the Perks menu to level up.
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes entirely two messages that pop up over and over again when you are encumbered, or when you haven't yet applied your level up.

This helps immersion I think!

Just download and extract to your Skyrim > Data folder, or simply download and install with Nexus Mod Manager.

Simple!
author: zyg0tic
